titles.title: An original resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Veterans. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Cranston. With written report No. 100-219.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 100-225.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 446.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 64-22. Record Vote No: 417.

bill.summary: 11/13/1987--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 80, 100th Congress, to increase the authorized expenditures of the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
